alert.note: Alert for Guilford; Randolph (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Randolph and southeastern Guilford Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Randleman, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, High Point, Asheboro, Randleman, Pleasant Garden, Liberty, Climax, Forest Oaks and Randleman Regional Reservior Marina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
